QuestData.Title: The True Crucible Awaits
QuestData.Description:
I confess, $n. I had little hope when you first arrived.
Kleia is convinced that your presence here is a sign of things finally improving in Bastion. I was... skeptical.
<The Forgelite gestures to her forge.>
What you have done for me will not soon be forgotten. There is a path beyond the Crucible. To walk it, you must overcome a trial. It will be difficult. Such a thing takes eons for most.
You are not most.
Kleia and Pelagos will tell you more. They await you near the sparring grounds.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Kleia and Pelagos in Aspirant's Crucible.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Kleia and Pelagos in Aspirant's Crucible.
QuestData.RewardText:
The Forgelite's gratitude goes deeper than you know.
Now. You must turn your attention back to our purpose here.
